local_intent: Verify approach/alignment to the white plate, execute pick, and if grasp unstable recompute grasp and retry.
assumptions: White plate is visible/reachable from current vantage
Gripper is open and operational before pick
Timeouts and tolerance bins match robot capabilities
coherence_with_global: Implements the detect→compute-grasp→approach/align→pick→verify loop from the global plan; includes a recovery branch to recompute and retry, using binned timeouts and top grasp strategy consistent with GLOBAL_BT and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION.
